TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Insectoid Wall Popping
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, this will turn off the destruction of adjacent wall when an insectoid wall is destroyed.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Stronger Insectoid Walls
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, increases insectoid wall health to be closer to wood in health, with the free to build hive wall being less durable.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Persistent Foampods
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes the expiring timer on foampods, so they do not die from time passing.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Craftable Creep
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows worker insectoids to build the creep terrain directly, just like the insectoid walls.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Faster Jelly Farms
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, makes jelly farms slightly faster than hives at producing jelly, since that's their sole purpose, you can adjust how much jelly they provide in the VFE-I2 options.
